FuncDef: The pki whitelist update command updates modified IPsec PKI whitelist data.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a whitelist file.
The value is a string of 1 to 127 characters.

Update all the modified whitelist data.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In whitelist-based IPsec certificate authentication scenarios, after a user runs the pki whitelist command to add or delete whitelist data, the modification does not take effect until the pki whitelist update command is executed.
